user_instruction: 'Respond to Lisa Green'"'"'s email (lisa.green@urbantimes.com) with my thoughts on social work in the community. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hello,

Could you please:
1. Pull up the most recent email from Lisa Green (lisa.green@urbantimes.com) in my Gmail inbox, and  
2. Share any Notion pages or notes I’ve filed under “Social Work,” “Community Outreach,” or similar tags?

This will help me draft an informed reply to Lisa about my thoughts on social work in the community.

Thank you!

final_output:
